name: celluloid
author: Erwan Queff√©lec <erwan.queffelec@gmail.com>
description: Celluloid helps students and teacher to interact by annotating online educational videos

scripts.watch: yarn build-libs && concurrently "yarn watch-types" "yarn watch-validators" "yarn watch-server" "yarn watch-client"
scripts.clean: for package in $(ls packages); do (cd packages/${package} && yarn clean); done
scripts.build: yarn build-libs && yarn build-client && yarn build-server
